allReviews.title: Loved it!
allReviews.review: Love the look of this bar stool!

allReviews.title: Purchasing more!!
allReviews.review: Looks great at my breakfast bar. Purchasing two more!

allReviews.title: Heavy!
allReviews.review: Heavy as hell but looks great in my bedroom. Looking forward to seeing it patina a bit.

allReviews.title: Great product!
allReviews.review: If I had room, I would get the matching side dressers.

allReviews.title: Amazing!
allReviews.review: Thought this dresser would look too industrial, but the wood drawers paired with steel really make it!

allReviews.title: Sturdy!
allReviews.review: Simple and sturdy design. Looks great in my loft but I need to figure out how to keep the mattress from slipping on the platform.

allReviews.title: Good table!
allReviews.review: Everyone loved it at the dinner party! Shipping was fast and assembly took less than 30 minutes

allReviews.title: Solid dining set
allReviews.review: With three kids, these dishes have held up after multiple spills, drops and knockovers. Solid dishes.

allReviews.title: Life changing bed.
allReviews.review: Great bed. Solid construction and beautifully designed. The fabirc easily cleans and extremely soft to the touch. I've been getting much better sleep and feel better than ever!

allReviews.title: Nice design but not very bright
allReviews.review: The lighting shade material is very thick and covers alot of the light being transmitted. This makes for a low amount of light even after we tried ultra white light bulbs. Looks great but not very bright.

allReviews.title: Elegant nightstand
allReviews.review: Recieved this as a gift and love how elegant it looks. Puts a smile on my face every morning I wake up to it.

allReviews.title: Thin rug
allReviews.review: We expected a bit thicker rug for the price. So thin some of the fabric material is starting to rub off after 4-5 months of light traffic. Wouldn't buy this rug again.

allReviews.title: Cracked after one hot summer day...
allReviews.review: Summers can get very hot here in Texas, my husband and I went on vacation and when we came back the heat must have cracked the mirror glass.
